bio: I am an experienced journalist who has transitioned from nearly a decade in TV news to full-time freelance writing. I am experienced in juggling multiple projects at once and working under tight deadlines. In addition to writing copy for on-air and web purposes over the years working in TV, I was also responsible for copy-editing reporter copy and managing the station’s social media accounts. During my time as a freelance writer, I have written blog posts and articles for various industries as well as press releases. I love writing and I especially love the research that goes into writing about so many different topics. I also really enjoy writing with wit and humor, when appropriate and the chance to bring a brand’s story to life. bio:
I am an experienced and highly skilled professional with expertise in WordPress and Shopify development, SEO, e-commerce, dropshipping, marketing, copywriting and content writing, and graphic design. My strong background in these areas allows me to deliver top-quality services for my clients, and I am always eager to take on new challenges and help my clients achieve their goals.

💻 I have a deep understanding of the tools and techniques used in each of these areas, and am proficient in a range of software and platforms. I have received education and training in these fields, and have a strong work ethic and a commitment to meeting deadlines.

💡 I follow a well-defined process when working on projects, which includes research, concept development, prototyping, and finalization. This ensures that my work is both original and practical.

🏆 In my work, I always strive for excellence and aim to exceed my clients' expectations. Please take a look at my portfolio for examples of my best work. I am available for new projects and would love to discuss how my skills and approach can help your business succeed.

My hours of operation are 9:00am to 5:00pm Eastern Standard Time, Monday to Friday 🕰. My preferred communication style is guru 💻, email 📧 and Skype 💬.

I am committed to delivering results that exceed your expectations . I am available to start working on your project immediately and I am confident that I can deliver results within the agreed-upon timeframe 🗓. I will provide regular updates on the progress and status of the project and I am always open to feedback and suggestions 🤝.

Thank you for considering me for your project. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

bio:
I am a passionate, hardworking writer and editor who graduated magna cum laude with a degree in English-Writing. Having recently released my debut novel with a Philadelphia-area publisher, I am currently a candidate for an MFA in Creative Writing, which has me taking a variety of advanced courses both in fiction and nonfiction.
Strength of mine is working fast but effectively, as I have a competitive turnaround time and the ability to write or edit blog posts, press releases, in fewer than 24 hours, edit full-length manuscripts in less than ten days, and complete the first draft of a novel (60K words) in under a month. I am known for being savvy at proofreading and catching errors in writing pieces.

Please consider me for any of your writing, editing, proofreading, or brainstorming needs. I have an unwavering passion for making things great through writing.

I look forward to working with you.

Thanks
I'm quite flexible.Payment terms are determined on a case-by-case basis, but require use of Guru's Safepay system.
